name: Truffle-Infused Sea Salt Cashews
description: Elevate your snacking experience with our Truffle-Infused Sea Salt Cashews. Each batch features premium, whole cashews gently roasted and coated in a delicate blend of Italian black truffle essence and hand-harvested sea salt. The result is a luxurious, savory snack with an irresistibly earthy aroma and a rich, buttery crunch. Perfect as an upscale treat for yourself or as a sophisticated addition to charcuterie boards and gift baskets. Non-GMO and packaged in a resealable pouch to preserve freshness.

attributes.ingredients: Cashews, sea salt, black truffle essence, olive oil
